name: Lead the great Death
description:
(Use the downladable version for the best experience)

Destroy villages, raise corpses to create an undead army and destroy the kingdom.

I know the title is written wrong in some places, but i couldn't fix it in time ^^

A game for the LTGD Game jam.

Controls:

mouse wheel: zoom in/zoom out

select unit/corpse: left click

move selected units: right click

raise corpse: e

split unit: e (only one selected)

merge units: e (multiple units selected)

stop time: space

increase speed: r

decrease speed: q

reset speed: t

Credits:

a Game by Malgios

Sound by https://freesound.org/people/Erdie/
